Exercise Recommendation: Start with light exercises such as walking or stretching. Focus on building strength gradually.
Diet Recommendation: Consume nutrient-rich foods such as fruits, vegetables, lean protein, and whole grains. Avoid processed foods and sugary drinks.

Exercise Recommendation: Incorporate moderate-intensity exercises such as jogging, cycling, or swimming. Also, include strength training exercises.
Diet Recommendation: Maintain a balanced diet with adequate protein, carbohydrates, and healthy fats. Avoid excessive calorie intake.

Exercise Recommendation: Engage in regular physical activities such as brisk walking, running, or gym workouts. Mix cardio and strength training exercises.

Exercise Recommendation: Focus on calorie-burning exercises such as running, cycling, or high-intensity interval training (HIIT). Incorporate strength training for muscle building.
Diet Recommendation: Adopt a balanced diet with a slight calorie deficit. Include plenty of fruits, vegetables, lean protein, and whole grains. Limit intake of high-calorie foods and beverages.

Exercise Recommendation: Consult with a fitness professional for personalized exercise plans. Emphasize on burning calories through various cardio and strength training exercises.
Diet Recommendation: Follow a structured meal plan focusing on portion control, calorie reduction, and nutrient-dense foods. Consider consulting with a dietitian for personalized dietary advice.
